title: 2021 Pre-Olympic Qualification Event
text:
The Pre-Olympic qualification event in curling is held from October 5 to 15 in <a href="Erzurum">Erzurum</a>, <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>. It is the last chance for National Olympic Committees to qualify for the Olympic qualification event. For mixed doubles three nations will qualify for the <a href="Curling%20at%20the%202022%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Qualification%20event">Olympic qualification event</a>. For the other two disciplines, men's and women's, only two nations will qualify for the Olympic qualification event.
